text: was a Japanese manga artist.Onoda Power, Natsu. God of Comics: Osamu Tezuka and the Creation of Postâ€“World War II Manga. University Press of Mississippi, 2009. p. 96. Great Comics Artists. . He did not like to call his work "manga" and called it "gekiga" instead. He was best known for Golgo 13. It is the oldest manga still in publication. Saito died of pancreatic cancer on September 24, 2021 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Japanese manga artists
title: Takao Saito
